p: For N. Sativa EOs, data represented in Figure 5 indicated that the highest significant repellency of S. oryzae adult stages was 77.5% at 0.75 mg/cm 2 after 5 h compared to its control at the same exposure time with the value of 93.2%, followed by 74.6 and 67.7% for 0.75 mg/cm 2 after 4 and 3 h, respectively, while the lowest significant repellency value was 45.6% at 0.25 mg/cm 2 EO after 1 h.
